name: Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch
description: '''Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch''' was an American [[hip-hop]] group formed in 1991 by [[Mark Wahlberg]] (alias Marky Mark), Scottie Gee, Hector the Booty Inspector, DJ-T, and Ashey Ace. The group's best known song is "[[Good Vibrations (Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch song)|Good Vibrations]]", which made it to number one on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] in 1991, while their follow-up song "[[Wildside (Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch song)|Wildside]]" peaked at number 10.
